actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend Section 611 of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to provide control and abatement of aircraft noise and sonic boom.

summary.text: Provides, under the Federal Aviation Act, that not later than October 27, 1973, the Environmental Protection Agency shall submit to the Federal Aviation Administration proposed regulations to provide such control and abatement of aircraft noise and sonic boom as the Agency determines is necessary to protect the public health and welfare.

titles.title: A bill to amend Section 611 of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to provide control and abatement of aircraft noise and sonic boom.
